com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Class SelectListUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.SelectListUtil

  • public final class SelectListUtil
extends Object
    Utility class used by AbstractWSelectList for processing options and list of options.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jonathan Austin

    • Method Detail

      • containsOption

        public static boolean containsOption(List<?> options,
                                     Object findOption)
        Iterate through the options to determine if an option exists.
        Parameters:
        options - the list of options
        findOption - the option to search for
        Returns:
        true if the list of options contains the option

      • containsOptionWithMatching

        public static boolean containsOptionWithMatching(List<?> options,
                                                 Object data)
        Iterate through the options to determine if an option exists allowing for Option/Code and Legacy matching.
        Parameters:
        options - the list of options
        data - the test data value
        Returns:
        true if the list of options contains the option

      • getOptionWithMatching

        public static Object getOptionWithMatching(List<?> options,
                                           Object data)
        Return the option that matches the data allowing for Option/Code and Legacy matching.

        This method should be used in conjunction with containsOptionWithMatching(List, Object) as this method will return null if no match found, but null could be a valid option.

        Parameters:
        options - the list of options
        data - the test data value
        Returns:
        the option that matches allowing for Option/Code and Legacy matching, otherwise return null

      • getFirstOption

        public static Object getFirstOption(List<?> options)
        Retrieve the first option. The first option maybe within an option group.
        Parameters:
        options - the list of options
        Returns:
        true the first option
